description: I'm Pete Lambert; husband, father, musician, open mic host and Design Manager at Logikcull, from Yorkshire. This is where things land when they fall out of my head.
shortbio: Brought up in Bradford and now living in York with my amazing wife and son. I play, sing and write music (not necessarily in that order), I ride bikes and snowboards and I host a virtual open mic night - Lockdown Open Mic
